name: Astronut Adventure
description:
Welcome Astronuts! In this game you play as an Astronut, and must make your way through 12 different puzzles while maintaining your health, oxygen, and fuel levels!

Controls: WASD to move, and fly to the door!

Credits:
"EDM Detection Mode", "Pamgaea"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
